{{infobox character | people=[[Rohirrim|Rohir]] | name=Théodwyn | image=Rebecca M. Beit-Aharon - Théodwyn.jpg | caption="Théodwyn" by [[:Category:Images by Rebecca M. Beit-Aharon|Rebecca M. Beit-Aharon]] | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Rohan]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{TA|2963}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death={{TA|3002}} (aged 39) | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Eorl]] | parentage=[[Thengel]] and [[Morwen Steelsheen|Morwen]] | siblings=[[Théoden]], three unnamed sisters | spouse=[[Éomund]] | children=[[Éomer]] and [[Éowyn]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Théodwyn''' ({{TA|2963}}-{{TA|3002|n}}) was the mother of [[Éomer]] and [[Éowyn]]. ==History== Théodwyn was a noble woman of [[Rohan]], the sister of [[Théoden]], and the daughter of [[Thengel]] and [[Morwen Steelsheen]]. She was married to [[Éomund]] of [[Eastfold]] in {{TA|2989}}. Her son Éomer was born in {{TA|2991|n}}, and her daughter Éowyn in {{TA|2995|n}}. Éomund was slain in {{TA|3002|n}}. Not long after that Théodwyn died of illness. Théoden raised her two children after her death.{{App|Eorl}} ==Etymology== ''Théodwyn'' is [[Old English]] for "joy of the people". ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | | | | | FEN | | | | | | | | EOF | | |FEN=[[Fengel]]
